name: Jellopy
description: Item from an era long forgotten, only good to be sold to Merchants. A small crystallization created by some monsters.

name: Sticky Mucus
description: Item from an era long forgotten, only good to be sold to Merchants. Gooey substance from a monster's insides.

name: Feather
description: Item from an era long forgotten, only good to be sold to Merchants. A feather that could be used as a pen or ornament.

name: Bug Leg
description: Item from an era long forgotten, only good to be sold to Merchants. A hind leg that has been cut clean during battle.

name: Garlet
description: Item from an era long forgotten, only good to be sold to Merchants. A shiny crystallization created by some monsters.

name: Zargon
description: Item from an era long forgotten, only good to be sold to Merchants. A vibrant green crystallization created by some monsters.

name: Fin
description: Item from an era long forgotten, only good to be sold to Merchants. A fish monster's fin.

name: Large Jellopy
description: Item from an era long forgotten, only good to be sold to Merchants. A huge jellopy.

name: Phracon
description: Item from an era long forgotten, only good to be sold to Merchants. A special metal that was once used for refinement.

name: Dead Branch
description: Item from an era long forgotten, only good to be sold to Merchants. A twig which used contain mysterious powers, now withered and dry.

name: Scell
description: Item from an era long forgotten, only good to be sold to Merchants. A golden crystallization created by some monsters.

name: Talon
description: Item from an era long forgotten, only good to be sold to Merchants. A sharp talon from a bird or draconic monster's foot.

name: Long Shell
description: Item from an era long forgotten, only good to be sold to Merchants. A solid, durable shell taken from a monster.

name: Round Shell
description: Item from an era long forgotten, only good to be sold to Merchants. A round shell that looks like it has been rolled up.

name: Cyfar
description: Item from an era long forgotten, only good to be sold to Merchants. A blue crystal that faintly shines with muddled light.

name: Poison Spore
description: Item from an era long forgotten, only good to be sold to Merchants. A clump of spores from a toxic mushroom.

name: Grit
description: Item from an era long forgotten, only good to be sold to Merchants. A cubic grain of sand that brightly sparkles.

name: Brigan
description: Item from an era long forgotten, only good to be sold to Merchants. A rare, red mineral.

name: Stone Heart
description: Item from an era long forgotten, only good to be sold to Merchants. A heart constructed entirely out of stone.

name: Goblin Fang
description: Item from an era long forgotten, only good to be sold to Merchants. A cuspid pulled out of a Goblin's mouth.

name: Rotten Bandage
description: Item from an era long forgotten, only good to be sold to Merchants. Old, dirty bandage that was used to preserve a body.

name: Ectoplasm
description: Item from an era long forgotten, only good to be sold to Merchants. Green translucent liquid that is disgustingly sticky, oozed from a ghost.

name: Gold Ore
description: An ore of a very precious metal. Can be refined into something even more valuable.

name: Pearl
description: Semi-precious gemstone, only good to be sold to Merchants. A round shiny jewel, created in the inside of a creature.

name: Opal
description: Semi-precious gemstone, only good to be sold to Merchants. Gem displaying an array of brilliant colors.

name: Garnet
description: Semi-precious gemstone, only good to be sold to Merchants. A dark red jewel.

name: Amethyst
description: Semi-precious gemstone, only good to be sold to Merchants. A purple jewel contained within a geode.

name: Aquamarine
description: Semi-precious gemstone, only good to be sold to Merchants. A clear, sky blue jewel.

name: Topaz
description: Semi-precious gemstone, only good to be sold to Merchants. A golden gem hardened with pressure.

name: Zircon
description: Semi-precious gemstone, only good to be sold to Merchants. A dazzling greenish blue gem.

name: Sardonyx
description: Semi-precious gemstone, only good to be sold to Merchants. An onyx with alternating brown and white bands of shard.

name: Sapphire
description: Precious gemstone, only good to be sold to Merchants. A rare dark blue gem.

name: Ruby
description: Precious gemstone, only good to be sold to Merchants. A rare deep maroon jewel.

name: Emerald
description: Precious gemstone, only good to be sold to Merchants. A very rare brilliant, green jewel.

name: Diamond
description: Very precious gemstone, only good to be sold to Merchants. A huge, dazzling gem that can be sold at an outrageous price.

name: Gold Bar
description: Very precious metal, only good to be sold to Merchants. A huge bullion of very valuable metal. Used to make coins, jewelry and gaudy false teeth.

name: Candy
description: Recovers a small amout of HP.

name: Candy Cane
description: Recovers a small amout of HP.

name: Red Stocking
description: A Christmas stocking from which presents were stolen through a hole made in the bottom.

name: Battle Manual
description: Special manual with powers to reward community. Exp rate is increased by 100% for 30 minutes for all server.

name: Slime King Ring
description:
Who could have guessed a Slime could wear a ring?
Do they even have fingers?
Apparently, this gooey monarch loved all of his rings, carrying them around even when forced to defend their territory.

name: Korsef's Tooth
description:
Korsef was once a mere man, though a formidable rogue, but was cursed during one of his adventures. Under the full moon, his appearance changed, and he transformed into a fearsome werewolf. His unmatched skills as a rogue were now only second to the terror his wolven visage brought. Stories whisper of him effortlessly slipping through the shadows, bypassing any trap, and leaving no trace behind except for the lifeless bodies of those he deemed enemies.

In his later years, driven by an unknown purpose, Korsef forged a dagger from one of his own teeth. This wasnt any ordinary tooth but a particularly large one, lost during a ferocious battle. With his innate dark magic and skills, he transformed the tooth into a blade that bore the same curse and ruthlessness as its master. The weapon emits a chilling necrotic energy that can drain the life force of any being it touches.

Special powers: Increases Bleed and Poison efficiency by +100%.

name: Unbreakable Protector of Saccharine
description:
Legendary Shield coated with what looks like an azure colored field.
The story fom this aegis can be found in the Capital's library: Saccharine was a Great Knight and Armorsmith, and was obsessed with creating the ultimate metal alloy.
After years on his mission, he was able to create an indestructible guard piece, able to return part of any impact it absorbs, magical or physical.

Special powers: Protects the wearer from the disarm debuff and reflect 15% of any damage taken back to the attacker.

name: Mitternacht's Molten Axe
description:
Oddly shaped fire emitting Axe. Legend says a man only known Mitternacht used to wield it.
The artisan behind this masterpiece must have been a master of blacksmithing and alchemy alike, for they were able to imbue the fire element into an axe of outstanding quality.
Has a chance to apply the Burn effect when Auto Attacking and grants the wielder immunity to Burning.

name: Orc Lords's Bracelet
description:
In a realm where might determined right, the Bracelet of the Orc Lord was the most coveted artifact, its weight heavy with both gold and ancient magic.
Said to have been forged from the molten core of a fallen star and inscribed with runes from the First Language, the band granted its bearer immense strength and the unwavering loyalty of all orcish clans.
Yet, its power came at a price: every full moon, the wearer's deepest fears manifested, ensuring that only a truly fearless leader, or one consumed by madness, dared to keep it on.

name: Zealotus Earring
description: Dangling delicately from the ear of its possessor, the Zealotus Earring was a testament to a forbidden love between realms. Its gem, a radiant fusion of sapphire and ruby, shimmered with the dual nature of its namesake  the half-demon, half-human Zealotus. Wearers of the earring were said to experience heightened senses and an unyielding passion in their endeavors, echoing Zealotus's own fierce determination to carve her place in a world that rejected her mixed heritage.

name: Diabolic's Brooch
description: The Diabolic's Brooch, no larger than a thumb yet pulsing with mischievous energy, was the prized trinket of the impish trickster Diabolic. Set with a gem that changed colors with its wearer's moods, the brooch granted its possessor an uncanny knack for illusions and playful deception. But the true magic lay in its unpredictability, for just as it could bring fortune, it might unleash chaos, reflecting Diabolic's own unpredictable nature. Those brave enough to pin it on found their days filled with laughter, surprise, and the occasional unexpected twist, reminding all that even the smallest trinkets could wield the greatest of powers if crafted by a master of mischief.

name: Rusted Iron Ring
description: However long this old thing has slept underwater, and how horribly corroded, it still retains part of its former magic, granting the wearer some protective capability, if ever so small.

name: Garm's Pendant
description:
Long before Ragnarok's war devastated the land, Garm, called by some Hatii, roamed the frozen plains.
A rabid wolfhound, cold as the nevermelting ices of Jotunheim, his breath alone could freeze any adventurer to the point of breaking.
From his frosty fur, a trinket was manufactured, which grants part of Garm's ferociousness and wintery chill.
When equipped, any melee attack that successfully hits the wearer has a chance of freezing the attacker with 15% chance. The chance gets higher depending on the level difference between them. During rain time while not in dungeon, or in case target is soaked, chance increased by 10%.

name: Maya's Necklace
description:
Long before Ragnarok's war devastated the land, Maya, the half human half insect queen, ruled the underground ant's nest known as Anthell.
Her feminine human body was attached from the waist down into a giant bug torso, clad in a shell possessing anti magical properties.
No one knows for certain if this necklace belonged to her or if part of her cast off shell was used to make it, but it carries within her unmistakable anti magic.
When equipped, the user has 30% chance to reflect back the damage to the caster of a single target magic skill.

name: Ghost Ring
description:
Long before Ragnarok's war devastated the land, Ghostring, an ethereal creature coveted by many eluded adventurers.
It was said its essence could grant a person the disposition of a phantom.
This ring has somehow absorbed that ghostly essence, and can extend it to its user.
When equipped, phase through neutral attacks 15% of the time. During night time chance increase by 5%.

name: Kobold's Belt
description: Made by a ferocious tribe whose denizens favor aggression over self-preservation. This belt is worn by all of their soldiers, regardless if they fight in the front, middle or backline.

name: Kobold's Sash
description: Made by a ferocious tribe whose denizens favor aggression over self-preservation. This sash is a much finer version of the frontliner's belt, imbued with powerful magic intended to make spells deadlier than ever.

name: Yggdrasil Infused Metal
description: Forged from the earth's depths, the enigmatic metal have an uncanny resilience, absorbing both magical and physical power of Yggdrasil.

name: Yggdrasil Infused Bark
description: Harvested from the ancient Yggdrasil Tree, the bark was renowned for its use in the construction of mythical shields and armors, imbuing them with an aura of invincibility and the wisdom of ages past.

name: Yggdrasil Arcane Powder
description: Arcane Powder infused with power of Yggdrasil, even a pinch could channel the cosmos, creating doorways between realms and awakening dormant spells with a potency that could reshape destiny

name: Runestone of Jotunheim
description: A runestone infused with the raw, untamed power of the giants from Jotunheim.

name: Nidhogg's Essence
description: Essence distilled from the ancient dragon Nidhogg, this material pulses with dark, primal energy. Part of it's essence is found in monsters around the world.

name: Gleipnir Fragments
description: Fragments of the legendary binding Gleipnir, these shards contain the strength of the gods and the resilience of mythical beasts.

name: Jotun Infused Metal
description: Fragments of the legendary binding Gleipnir, these shards contain the strength of the gods and the resilience of mythical beasts.

name: Nidhogg's Infused Bark
description: Fragments of the legendary binding Gleipnir, these shards contain the strength of the gods and the resilience of mythical beasts.

name: Gleipnir's Arcane Powder
description: Fragments of the legendary binding Gleipnir, these shards contain the strength of the gods and the resilience of mythical beasts.

name: Lesser Cooling Salve
description: Salve that helps stop schorched skin. Remove 10 debuffs of Scorch.

name: Cooling Salve
description: Salve that helps stop schorched skin. Remove 50 debuffs of Scorch.

name: Greater Cooling Salve
description: Salve that helps stop schorched skin. Remove 100 debuffs of Scorch.

name: Makeshift Bandage
description: Bandage that helps stops bleeding. Remove 1 debuff of Bleed.

name: Simple Bandage
description: Bandage that helps stops bleeding. Remove 3 debuffs of Bleed.

name: Antiseptic Bandage

name: Phoenix Feather
description: Single plume, still warm, said to reignite the flame of life in those who've fallen. Brings your character from KO state in battle.

name: Soul Shard
description: Soul Shard which emanates energy from Yggdrasil, the tree of life. Used to perform several magical enchantments and transmutations.

name: Soul Fragment
description: Fragment from Elite monster. You can feel very faded Yggdrasil power in it. It can be probably used in transmutation.

name: Venom Dust
description: Enchantment dust, required to enchant high quality weapons, to make a new one

name: Torch
description: Item that is very helpful when you delve into the dungeon to keep your party visibility high

name: Low Grade Bedroll
description: Item that is very helpful when you delve into the dungeon to keep your party fatigue levels low. Low quality bedroll. Remove 1 stacks of fatigue.

name: Average Bedroll
description: Item that is very helpful when you delve into the dungeon to keep your party fatigue levels low. Average quality bedroll.Remove 3 stacks of fatigue.

name: Comfortable Bedroll
description: Item that is very helpful when you delve into the dungeon to keep your party fatigue levels low. Great quality bedroll. Remove 6 stacks of fatigue.

name: Luxurious Bedroll
description: Item that is very helpful when you delve into the dungeon to keep your party fatigue levels low. Best quality bedroll. Remove 15 stacks of fatigue.

name: Halloween Treat
description: Haloween Treats, can be used for healing or to trade for special rewards

name: Halloween Trick
description: Haloween Trick item, can be used on other player to spook them only during Halloween event. It makes their screen drip blood with your custom message. You are limited to spook other player once per event. To trigger a trick use command /halloween-trick X MESSAGE, where X is a player name and MESSAGE is your custom message.

name: Legacy ROI Membership
description: Legacy membership scroll, allowing you to get Premium Membership for 14 days. Using multiple scrolls stack days. For all benefits, see Fame Shop. This scroll can not be traded, sold or moved to storage.

name: ROI Membership
description: Membership scroll, allowing you to get Premium Membership for 1 month. Using multiple scrolls stack days. For all benefits, see Fame Shop.

name: Riches Manual
description: Special manual with powers to reward community. Drop/Gathering rate is increased by 100% for 30 minutes for all server.

name: New Year Porcelain Gift Box
description: A box which contains a gift.

name: New Year Iron Gift Box
description: A box which contains a gift.

name: New Year Steel Gift Box
description: A box which contains a gift.

name: New Year Bronze Gift Box
description: A box which contains a gift.

name: New Year Silver Gift Box
description: A box which contains a gift.

name: New Year Gold Gift Box
description: A box which contains a gift.

name: New Year Surprise Box
description: A box which contains a special gift. Manuals, special hats, fireworks. Only for you.

name: Fireworks
description: Summon fireworks on game screen for everyone in the game to celebrate New Year. Only works when New Year event is ON. Amount of fireworks you trigger = amount of seconds firing.
